pd_0_com_0text: Hi! Welcome to the Second Sprint Demo!
pd_0_com_1text: I'm a sample NPC made purely to show off the power of the new dialogue system we've implemented!
pd_0_com_2text: Some things to note about this sprint: We know movement is still a little janky, not all of our new work has made it into this demo, and if you're not careful, yes, you'll fall off the map.
pd_0_com_3text: Then we have to restart the game. So please try not to do that.
pd_0_com_4text: The other "NPC"s you'll find around here are samples from the Unity Asset we have borrowed from. They'll give you a better idea of what this new system is capable of.
pd_0_com_5text: We owe a big thanks to the original owner of the asset giving blanket permission for edits to his sample files.
pd_0_com_6text: One last note: we only just last night figured out how to make interacting with NPCs easier, so the other guys are a bit... janky. Keep trying: you'll get in eventually!
